megapi_camera_switch_color_mode: 視覺模組 [PORT] 切換到色塊偵測模式
megapi_camera_recognize_color: 視覺模組 [PORT] 開始學習色塊 [SIG] 直到按鈕按下
megapi_camera_color_in_center: 視覺模組 [PORT] 識別到色塊 [SIG] 在影像 [LOCATION]？
megapi_camera_color_coordinate: 視覺模組 [PORT] 識別到色塊 [SIG] 的 [CCCINFO]
megapi_camera_set_white_balance: 視覺模組 [PORT] 重置白平衡
megapi_camera_switch_line_qrcode_mode: 視覺模組 [PORT] 切換到 線段/標籤 追蹤模式
megapi_camera_get_qrcode_coordinate: label [BARCODE]'s [BARCODEINFO] coordinate returned by smart camera [PORT]
megapi_camera_line_start_coordinate: 視覺模組 [PORT] 目前線段的 [LINEINFO]
megapi_camera_get_cross: 視覺模組 [PORT] 識別到交叉點?
megapi_camera_corss_coordinate: cross point's [COORDINATES] coordinate returned by smart camera [PORT]
megapi_camera_get_branch_num: number of cross-points returned by smart camera [PORT]
megapi_camera_get_branch_angle: angle of number [NUMBER] cross-point returned by smart camera [PORT]
megapi_camera_set_line_mode: 視覺模組 [PORT] 將線段追蹤模式設定為 [LINEMODE]
megapi_camera_1566200454757: 視覺模組 [PORT] 將首選角度設定為 [ANGLE]
megapi_camera_1566200474887: 視覺模組 [PORT] 目前首選角度 (°)
megapi_camera_set_kp: 視覺模組 [PORT]: 在馬達速差計算中將 Kp 設定為 [KP]
megapi_camera_follow_color: 視覺模組 [PORT] 計算馬達差分速度（自動追隨色塊 [SIG] 至 [LOCATION] 軸 [NUMBER]）
megapi_camera_follow_qrcode: 視覺模組 [PORT] 計算馬達差分速度（自動追隨標籤 [BARCODE] 至 [LOCATION] 軸 [NUMBER])
megapi_camera_get_diff_speed: 視覺模組 [PORT] 計算馬達差分速度（目標為線段追蹤部分）
megapi_camera_lock_color: 視覺模組 [PORT] 鎖定色塊 [SIG] 到 [LOCATION] 軸 [NUMBER] 附近?
megapi_camera_lock_qrcode: 視覺模組 [PORT] 鎖定標籤 [BARCODE] 到 [LOCATION] 軸 [NUMBER] 附近?
